title: 3 lessons from building our MVP
body:
After 6 months of development, here's what I learned:

1. Start with the problem, not the solution
2. Talk to users early and often
3. Build the minimum that validates your hypothesis

What would you add to this list?

title: The engineering mindset that changed everything
body:
One shift in thinking transformed how our team approaches problems:

🔍 From "How do we build this?"
✅ To "Should we build this?"

This simple question saves us weeks of unnecessary work.

What questions help you prioritize better?
